dict.string: Today is 15 days, which are two weeks and one day, of the Omer.
Hoy es quince días, que son dos semanas y un día del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est quinze jours, qui sont deux semaines et un jour du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ ПЯТНАДЦАТЬ ДНЕЙ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ДВЕ НЕДЕЛИ И ОДНИ ДЕНЬ - ОМЕРА.
הַיּוֹם חֲמִשָּׁה עָשָׂר יוֹם שֶׁהֵם שְׁנֵי שָׁבוּעוֹת וְיוֹם אֶחָד לָעֽוֹמֶר

Hessed chebeTiféret
ХЕСЕД ШЕБЕ-ТИФЕРЕС
חֶֽסֶד שֶׁבְּתִפְאֶרֶת
Chesed of Tiferet
Lovingkindness in Compassion
Examine the love aspect of compassion.
How to be an Emotionally Warm Person

How can you be an emotionally warm person in a cold, hostile world? Is there a way to be open and giving without being naive or taken advantage of? Please join Rabbi Simon Jacobson, best-selling author of Toward a Meaningful Life and counselor to thousands, for a short, inspiring talk on how to be an emotionally warm person. Learn the key to brightening and warming your corner of the world.
https://youtu.be/vKSAlyXMk5w
When helping someone, extend yourself in the fullest way. Offer a smile or a loving gesture.
Is my compassion tender and loving or does it come across as pity?
Ask yourself:
Is my sympathy condescending and patronizing?
Even if my intention is otherwise, do others perceive it as such?
Does my compassion overflow with love and warmth; is it expressed with enthusiasm or is it static and lifeless?
